amendment.description: Amendment sought to cap the number of mortgages the FHA can issue to 10% of total loans originated in the U.S. each year. Within 90 days of enactment the FHA must submit a plan to Congress to roll back FHA market share to 10% of loans originated each year by 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-503 to cap the number of mortgages the FHA can issue to 10% of total loans originated in the U.S. each year. Within 90 days of enactment, FHA must submit a plan to Congress to roll back FHA market share to 10% of loans originated each year by 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 316 (Roll no. 349).
